meaningMnemonic: To start a business, your <kanji>main</kanji> <kanji>resource</kanji> is your <vocabulary>capital</vocabulary>, which can be money and various other types of assets, like real estate properties.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
